entry.title: Episode 001 - Blazor United & HTMX - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the first episode of our exciting new podcast, "The Breakpoint Podcast"! Join us as we dive deep into the dynamic world of software development, exploring the cutting-edge technologies that shape the digital landscape.

image.title: Episode 001 - Blazor United & HTMX - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 002 - How to find OSS & the .NET Time Loop - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome back to another insightful episode of "Web Dev Unleashed"! In our second episode, we're embarking on a fascinating journey through the realms of the .NET ecosystem. Join us as we uncover the intricate web of .NET open-source projects and delve into an intriguing concept we've coined as the "time loop of .NET."

image.title: Episode 002 - How to find OSS & the .NET Time Loop - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 003 - Skill Growth Tips & Tricks - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to another captivating episode of ‚ÄúThe Breakpoint Show‚Äù! In our third installment, we‚Äôre diving deep into the world of professional growth and development. Join us as we uncover a treasure trove of invaluable tips and tricks that will elevate your skills and supercharge your career in the ever-evolving realm of technology. In this episode, we‚Äôre pulling back the curtain on three game-changing strategies that can take your journey in the developer world to new heights. First up, we‚Äôre exploring the power of blogging. Discover how sharing your insights, challenges, and triumphs through blogging can solidify your understanding and establish your presence in the developer community. We‚Äôll share proven techniques to start and maintain a compelling tech blog that resonates with both beginners and seasoned professionals.

image.title: Episode 003 - Skill Growth Tips & Tricks - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 005 - Asserting Success: Navigating .NET Testing - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome back to another enlightening episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! entry.title: Episode 006 - Beyond the .NET Horizon: Diving into Diverse Dev Tech - The Breakpoint Show

Join us as we dive deep into the vast ocean of software development tools, ideas, and innovations from other communities that can provide .NET developers with a distinct advantage.

entry.title: Episode 007 - Halloween Special: A Developer's Fright Night - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to a spine-tingling, code-infested Halloween special episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! Join us as we embark on a hair-raising journey into the darkest corners of technology, where we confront the tech that haunts our nightmares and contemplate what we'd "murder" and reanimate for a brighter tech future.

entry.title: Episode 008 - Exploring .NET's Hidden Gems - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the fifth episode of "The Breakpoint Show," where we're about to embark on a journey of discovery through the intricate world of .NET and C#! entry.title: Episode 010 - JetBrains & Stackoverflow Community Surveys - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the milestone tenth episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! In this special installment, we're diving deep into the fascinating world of developer surveys. Join us for a thought-provoking discussion as we dissect and analyze the key insights and trends revealed in the 2023 developer surveys from JetBrains and Stack Overflow.

image.title: Episode 010 - JetBrains & Stackoverflow Community Surveys - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 011 - The Future of Software Development Workflows - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the eleventh episode of "The Breakpoint Show," where we're diving headfirst into the future of software development workflows! Join us for a captivating exploration of the evolving landscape of how we build, test, deploy, and maintain software. In this episode, we're your guides through the exciting world of cutting-edge software development practices and methodologies. We'll discuss how workflows are evolving in response to emerging technologies, shifting paradigms, and the ever-increasing demand for efficiency and agility.

image.title: Episode 011 - The Future of Software Development Workflows - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 012 - Lambos & Pickled Boloney: Learning New Skills - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 013 - SQUIRREL! - How to Focus - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the thirteenth episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! üéôÔ∏è In this uproarious installment, we're tackling the age-old challenge of staying focused as a software professional, and we're doing it with a twist. Why do software developers sometimes chase new ideas, like dogs spotting squirrels in the park? üê∂üêøÔ∏è We've all been there ‚Äì one moment, you're deep in code, and the next, you're off on a wild tangent. Join us as we explore the art of staying on track, even when the lure of squirrels (metaphorical or otherwise) is strong.

image.title: Episode 013 - SQUIRREL! - How to Focus - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 014 - .NET Framework to .NET Latest Migration Strategy Session - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the fourteenth episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! In this highly anticipated installment, we're diving deep into migration strategies, exploring the ins and outs of transitioning from .NET Framework to .NET Core or newer versions of the .NET Framework.

image.title: Episode 014 - .NET Framework to .NET Latest Migration Strategy Session - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 015 - Dude, Where's My Data? - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the fifteenth episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! Today, we're diving deep into data and storage technologies, exploring how our .NET Core applications access and interact with data. Data is the lifeblood of modern applications, and choosing the right storage technology is crucial for ensuring scalability, performance, and reliability. Join us as we unravel the diverse storage options available to .NET Core developers, from traditional relational databases to NoSQL solutions and cloud-based storage services.

image.title: Episode 015 - Dude, Where's My Data? - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 016 - The 1 Billion Row Challenge With Mark Rendle - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to a groundbreaking episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! üéôÔ∏è We're thrilled to welcome our first-ever guest, the legendary Mark Rendle, to the studio. Together, we're diving headfirst into the exhilarating world of the 1 Billion Row Challenge and unraveling the mysteries of .NET and C# performance in this epic competition. The 1 Billion Row Challenge is not for the faint of heart‚Äîit's a test of skill, ingenuity, and raw performance prowess. Join us as Mark delves into the intricacies of the challenge and discusses his strategies for tackling it head-on. From optimizing code and leveraging parallelism to fine-tuning floating-point calculations, he'll leave no stone unturned in his quest for victory.

image.title: Episode 016 - The 1 Billion Row Challenge With Mark Rendle - The Breakpoint Show

entry.title: Episode 025 - 10X Platform - DBOS - Postgres & TypeScript with Harry Pierson - The Breakpoint Show
entry.summary: Welcome to the twenty-fifth episode of "The Breakpoint Show"! We're thrilled to feature a special guest, Harry Pierson, who joined us to discuss his company, DBOS, and its cutting-edge technology. Conceived by researchers at MIT and Stanford, DBOS is revolutionizing how we approach cloud application development and deployment. Join us as we dive deep into the innovative DBOS platform, which comprises DBOS Transact and DBOS Cloud. Harry will take us through the remarkable features and benefits of these tools and how they are set to transform the cloud development landscape.

image.title: Episode 025 - 10X Platform - DBOS - Postgres & TypeScript with Harry Pierson - The Breakpoint Show
